ConnectForHealth has levelled up! As a gentle reminder, if you have not done so already, please register for our session 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/x62DCR5EGUQ10qRuNhqf16GrK?domain=app.info.cignaglobal.com> 	  	  <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3303256f-b00c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B9bb92e7f-2a1e-4455-b3fb-ee5c122e7f9d%7D_cfh_new.png> 	

ConnectForHealth 

Cigna Healthcare's wellbeing series 

 	 
You are invited to join our next ConnectForHealth session: 
Improving Mobility and Flexibility 


Save the date 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B6e32d3b1-662c-4f7f-a345-324ca175bb17%7D_calendar_blue_icon.png> 	
Date: 
Wednesday 
May 28 

 	  <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B8d5382ad-38b8-4b08-bcf6-d28255632e74%7D_clock_blue_icon.png> 	
Time: 
11:00 AM - 12:00 PM 
(Gulf Standard Time) 

	

Meet the hosts 


Scott Armstrong 

Mental Health Advocate, Award-Winning Journalist and Podcaster 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3167f098-04e6-4726-9288-d111d2b75048%7D_Scott_Armstrong_2025.JPG> 	
 	 
Maissa AlKhafajy

chunks.text:
Mental Health Advocate, Award-Winning Journalist and Podcaster 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3167f098-04e6-4726-9288-d111d2b75048%7D_Scott_Armstrong_2025.JPG> 	
 	 
Maissa AlKhafajy 

Head of Government Relations and Strategic Communications, Cigna Healthcare MEA 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb1896a80-8df9-4554-9238-55f52723bf0e%7D_Maissa_2025.JPG> 	

What to expect 

You'll learn how to enhance your body’s health and vitality with simple, effective movements to help keep you strong, agile and pain-free for years to come. 

Click here to register <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/lI1QCV0LMUX6ko5fyiRfE5_sR?domain=event.on24.com> 	

Guest Speaker: Sarah Lindsay 

Olympic Athlete and Founder of Roar Fitness 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B2b11560e-96cf-4e57-85e5-2aa9b8f16fd1%7D_Sarah_Lindsay.JPG> 	 	 A three-time Olympian, Sarah Lindsay is a personal trainer like no other. She is a European gold medalist, 2x world silver medalist and 10x British speed skating champion. Sarah is one of London's most recognised celebrity personal trainers that has trained the likes of Ellie Goulding, Nick Grimshaw and Mel B. 

Passionate about health and fitness, Sarah truly practices what she preaches and has a unique ability to inspire, empowering her clients to take control of their lives. 

 	 
If you face any problems with registration, please write to us on meacommunications@cigna.com <mailto:meacommunications@cigna.com>
